channel.title: Blockware Intelligence Podcast
channel.description:
Breaking down all things Bitcoin with Head Analyst of Blockware Intelligence, Joe Burnett.
Keep up to date with his invaluable insight via the Blockware Intelligence Podcast and Blockware Intelligence Newsletter.
Twitter: @IIICapital
Blockware Intelligence Newsletter: blockwareintelligence.com

item.title: Bitcoin Mining Masterclass w/ Ethan Vera
item.description:
Ethan Vera, COO of Luxor Mining, joins Joe to discuss new generation mining rigs and the future of the Bitcoin mining industry.


Follow us on Twitter:

Joe: https://twitter.com/IIICapital

Ethan: https://twitter.com/ethan_vera

Blockware: https://twitter.com/BlockwareTeam 


Timestamps: 

00:00 Intro 

01:53 Mining in a Bear Market

06:43 Using new generation mining rigs as a Hedge 

12:27 Hash Price 

14:57 Measuring Hash Rate 

24:01 Estimating Mining Variables 

30:43 How will the Mining Industry Develop

item.title: The Current State of Bitcoin Mining with Bob Burnett
item.description:
Joe Burnett and Bob Burnett (no relation) discuss the current Bitcoin Mining environment as well as what threats may be looming and how miners can defend against attacks. 


Mine Bitcoin with Blockware Solutions: https://www.blockwaresolutions.com/co... 


Follow us on Twitter: 

Joe: https://twitter.com/IIICapital

Bob: https://twitter.com/boomer_btc

Blockware: https://twitter.com/BlockwareTeam 


Timestamps:  00:00 Intro 

00:58 Bob's Bitcoin Background 

09:45 The Current State of the Mining Market 

13:13 Bitcoin vs the Dot Com Bubble 

19:37 "Wild Horses" in Bitcoin Mining 

26:50 Pros and Cons of Different Sized Mining Operations 

39:12 Convincing Boomers "Why Bitcoin"

item.title: Bitcoin will be a $150+ Trillion Dollar Asset with Murad Mahmudov
item.description:
Joe Burnett and Murad Mahmudov discuss Bitcoin and how it can become the global reserve currency.

Follow us on Twitter:

Joe: https://twitter.com/IIICapital

Murad: https://twitter.com/MustStopMurad

Blockware: https://twitter.com/BlockwareTeam 


Timestamps: 

00:00 Intro

00:36 Murad's Background and Bitcoin Story 

02:27 Explaining Bitcoin to Older, Tradfi People 

04:02 What makes Bitcoin better than the Traditional Monetary System 

06:47 What is Hyper-Bitcoinization? Can it happen? 

09:05 The future value of Bitcoin 

13:01 The world under a Bitcoin Standard 

14:34 Will we go through Hyperinflation? 

19:06 Is Bitcoin ACTUALLY an inflation hedge? 

20:09 Diversify or 100% Bitcoin? 

21:46 What is the promise of Bitcoin? 

23:32 Bitcoin and Geopolitics 

29:59 Order vs Chaos 

31:11 STFX

item.title: Bitcoin: Security or Commodity?
item.description:
Joe sits down with Bryan Jacoutot, an Attorney and a Bitcoiner, to discuss securities, commodities, Bitcoin regulation, and more! 


Make sure to subscribe to the podcast!


Follow us on Twitter: 

Joe: https://twitter.com/IIICapital

Bryan: https://twitter.com/BryanJacoutot

Blockware: https://twitter.com/BlockwareTeam


Timestamps: 

00:00 Intro/Bryan's Background

03:35 Election Litigation 

06:46 Securities vs Commodities in the Eyes of the Law 

09:44 Historical Howie Test Applications 

13:00 "Blockchain" Marketing 15:47 Why is Bitcoin not a Security 

28:40 Bitcoin, Neutral Money, and Regulation 

39:35 Bitcoin, States Rights, and Politics 

47:55 Diminishing Trust in Institutions

item.title: The Future Economics of Bitcoin Settlement Finality
item.description:
Blockware Head Analyst, Joe Burnett, and Riot Blockchain VP of Research, Pierre Rochard, breakdown their collaborative research report on Bitcoin Transaction fees. This is a recording of a live twitter spaces from 9/20/22. 


Read the full report here: https://blockwaresolutions.com/s/Bitcoin-Transaction-Fees-Final-Draft.pdf
